articles.author: Alice O'Connor
articles.title: Activision Blizzard decline to recognise Raven QA union - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: The QA team are Warzone studio Raven Software are moving to unionise the long way, through the NLRB, after Activision Blizzard refused to recognise it.
articles.content: Activision Blizzard have declined to voluntarily recognise the union forming at Raven Software's QA department, forcing workers to take the long approach. The group calling themselves the Game Worker… [+4577 chars]
